name: ACECQA:acecqa_childeducationservices_aus
title: Early Childhood Education and Care Services for Australia
abstract: ACECQA is an independent national authority which guides the implementation of the National Quality Framework for Early Childhood Education and Care nationally. This dataset includes the location of licensed children's services all over Australia. Also it has the National Quality Standard ratings for the quality of education and care services available. Further information relating to the datasource is available from here: Additional Information

selectedAttributes.name: qualityarea1rating
selectedAttributes.title: Quality Area 1 Rating
selectedAttributes.description: Quality area 1 is a rating of the National Quality Standard focuses on ensuring that the educational program and practice is stimulating and engaging and enhances children???s learning and development.The values include excellent rating, exceeding NQS, meeting NQS, working Towards NQS, Significant Improvement Required and Provisional_Not yet assessed.

selectedAttributes.name: qualityarea2rating
selectedAttributes.title: Quality Area 2 Rating
selectedAttributes.description: Quality area 2 is a rating of the National Quality Standard focuses on safeguarding and promoting children???s health and safety. The values include excellent rating, exceeding NQS, meeting NQS, working Towards NQS, Significant Improvement Required and Provisional_Not yet assessed.

selectedAttributes.name: qualityarea3rating
selectedAttributes.title: Quality Area 3 Rating
selectedAttributes.description: Quality area 3 is a rating of the National Quality Standard focuses on the physical environment and ensuring that it is safe, suitable and provides a rich and diverse range of experiences that promote children???s learning and development.The values include excellent rating, exceeding NQS, meeting NQS, working Towards NQS, Significant Improvement Required and Provisional_Not yet assessed.

selectedAttributes.name: qualityarea4rating
selectedAttributes.title: Quality Area 4 Rating
selectedAttributes.description: Quality area 4 is a rating of the National Quality Standard focuses on the provision of qualified and experienced educators, co-ordinators and nominated supervisors who are able to develop warm, respectful relationships with children, create safe and predictable environments and encourage children???s active engagement in the learning program.The values include excellent rating, exceeding NQS, meeting NQS, working Towards NQS, Significant Improvement Required and Provisional_Not yet assessed.

selectedAttributes.name: qualityarea5rating
selectedAttributes.title: Quality Area 5 Rating
selectedAttributes.description: Quality area 5 is a rating of the National Quality Standard focuses on relationships with children being responsive and respectful and promoting children???s sense of security and belonging. Relationships of this kind free children to explore the environment and engage in play and learning. The values include excellent rating, exceeding NQS, meeting NQS, working Towards NQS, Significant Improvement Required and Provisional_Not yet assessed.

selectedAttributes.name: overallrating
selectedAttributes.title: Overall Rating
selectedAttributes.description: The Overal rating of the service according to National Quality Standard. The values include excellent rating, exceeding NQS, meeting NQS, working Towards NQS, Significant Improvement Required and Provisional_Not yet assessed.

selectedAttributes.name: qualityarea6rating
selectedAttributes.title: Quality Area 6 Rating
selectedAttributes.description: Quality area 6 is a rating of the National Quality Standard focuses on collaborative relationships with families that are fundamental to achieving quality outcomes for children and community partnerships that are based on active communication, consultation and collaboration. The values include excellent rating, exceeding NQS, meeting NQS, working Towards NQS, Significant Improvement Required and Provisional_Not yet assessed.

selectedAttributes.name: qualityarea7rating
selectedAttributes.title: Quality Area 7 Rating
selectedAttributes.description: Quality area 7 is a rating of the National Quality Standard focuses on effective leadership and management of the service that contributes to quality environments for children???s learning and development. The values include excellent rating, exceeding NQS, meeting NQS, working Towards NQS, Significant Improvement Required and Provisional_Not yet assessed.
